ResourceHeader.ResourceName: A visible all-sky camera at Kototabang
ResourceHeader.Description: The all-sky camera (Prede, Model PSV-100) at Kototabang, Indonesia (0.20S, 100.32E, 865m MSL) acquires all-sky color images in jpeg format on a continuous operation basis with a time resolution of 1-min interval since 14 March 2013. Details can be found in the PDF document (http://prede.com/english/PDF/skyview_psv-100_en2.pdf).

Instrument.InvestigationName: RISH all sky camera at Kototabang (regular operation)
